matview_sql: (SELECT name FROM recipient_normalization_pair(legal_entity.recipient_name, COALESCE(x.duns, transaction_fabs.awardee_or_recipient_uniqu)) AS (name text, duns text)),
to_tsvector((SELECT name FROM recipient_normalization_pair(legal_entity.recipient_name, COALESCE(x.duns, transaction_fabs.awardee_or_recipient_uniqu)) AS (name text, duns text)
) x ON transaction_normalized.id = x.transaction_id AND transaction_normalized.is_fpds = true
